attributes.action: honour Wootten Bassett  for their representing the people of Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are sure that the nation has been moved by the proud and dignified way that the people of Wootten Bassett have saluted our returning fallen heroes. The town has earned some mark of appreciation and we move that the town itself be awarded the distinction of an MBE and should be styled 'Wootten Bassett MBE'.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
